snippet.title: City Game Studio Gameplay trailer GOG Release
snippet.description:
** Official release 24th August 2021 **
City Game Studio is a game development simulation sandbox  game. 

You are the founder of your video game company. The starting point belongs to you, in your garage, or think big instead of small by acquiring your first local. At the end of the day, your decisions will make your studio a success and will mark the Video Game History.
Buy City Game Studio
https://www.gog.com/game/city_game_studio_a_tycoon_about_game_dev

•   -   Follow us   -   •
GOG: TBA
Discord: https://discord.gg/citygamestudio
Site: https://www.city-game-studio.com
Presskit: https://www.city-game-studio.com/press.html
Studio : http://www.binogure-studio.com
Twitter : https://twitter.com/binogure
